quote: It is not titles that honor men, but men that honor titles.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: All courses of action are risky, so prudence is not in avoiding danger (it's impossible), but calculating risk and acting decisively.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: It must be considered that there is nothing more difficult to carry out, nor more doubtful of success, nor more dangerous to handle, than to initiate a new order of things.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Men intrinsically do not trust new things that they have not experienced themselves.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: He who becomes a Prince through the favor of the people should always keep on good terms with them; which it is easy for him to do, since all they ask is not to be oppressed.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Minds are of three kinds: one is capable of thinking for itself; another is able to understand the thinking of others; and a third can neither think for itself nor understand the thinking of others. The first is of the highest excellence, the second is excellent, and the third is worthless.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Princes and governments are far more dangerous than other elements within society.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: For whoever believes that great advancement and new benefits make men forget old injuries is mistaken.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: It is essential that in entering a new province you should have the good will of its inhabitants.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: He who is highly esteemed is not easily conspired against;
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Therefore the best fortress is to be found in the love of the people, for although you may have fortresses they will not save you if you are hated by the people.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: There is no other way to guard yourself against flattery than by making men understand that telling you the truth will not offend you.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Without an opportunity, their abilities would have been wasted, and without their abilities, the opportunity would have arisen in vain.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: The lion cannot protect himself from traps, and the fox cannot defend himself from wolves. One must therefore be a fox to recognize traps, and a lion to frighten wolves.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: I'm not interested in preserving the status quo; I want to overthrow it.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: People should either be caressed or crushed. If you do them minor damage they will get their revenge; but if you cripple them there is nothing they can do. If you need to injure someone, do it in such a way that you do not have to fear their vengeance.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: A prudent man should always follow in the path trodden by great men and imitate those who are most excellent, so that if he does not attain to their greatness, at any rate he will get some tinge of it.
author: Niccolò Machiavelli
title: The Prince

quote: 1. Accept everything just the way it is.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 2. Do not seek pleasure for its own sake.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 3. Do not, under any circumstances, depend on a partial feeling.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 4. Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 5. Be detached from desire your whole life long.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 6. Do not regret what you have done.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 7. Never be jealous.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 8. Never let yourself be saddened by a separation.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 9. Resentment and complaint are appropriate neither for oneself nor others.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 10. Do not let yourself be guided by the feeling of lust or love.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 11. In all things have no preferences.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 12. Be indifferent to where you live.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 13. Do not pursue the taste of good food.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 14. Do not hold on to possessions you no longer need.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 15. Do not act following customary beliefs.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 16. Do not collect weapons or practice with weapons beyond what is useful.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 17. Do not fear death.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 18. Do not seek to possess either goods or fiefs for your old age.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 19. Respect Buddha and the gods without counting on their help.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 20. You may abandon your own body but you must preserve your honour.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: 21. Never stray from the Way.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: It is difficult to understand the universe if you only study one planet
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: Today is victory over yourself of yesterday
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: Get beyond love and grief: exist for the good of Man.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: Do not regret what you have done
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings

quote: Know your enemy, know his sword.
author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: The Book of Five Rings
